titles.title: A concurrent resolution concerning the removal of military forces of the Russian Federation from the independent nation of Moldova.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 10/5/1994--Introduced. Urges: (1) the Government of the Russian Federation to adhere to the provisions of the agreement initialed on August 10, 1994, to provide for the withdrawal of its military forces from Moldova; and (2) the Administration to continue to use every appropriate opportunity, including multilateral and bilateral diplomacy, to secure removal of such forces.
